channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spotify ventures into physical book sales, adds new audiobook features
item.description: Spotify users in the U.S. and the UK will soon be able to buy physical books in the app. There's also a new tool that syncs physical books to audioboo...

item.title: As it preps Specs for the masses, Snap’s Q4 shows revenue growth but fewer daily users
item.description: The company is engaged in a strategy to diversify its revenue sources as it heads into the new year.

item.title: The Best Flower Delivery Services of 2026, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Skip the sad grocery store bouquet this Valentine’s Day. These online flower delivery services do the heavy lifting for you—just don't forget the card...

item.title: How the Olympic Torchbearers Are Chosen
item.description: From world-class athletes to the stars of Heated Rivalry, torchbearers are selected for their inspiring stories. Here’s what to know about the people ...

item.title: Mundi Ventures closes on €750M for Kembara, its largest deep tech and climate fund
item.description: Spain-based deeptech and climate megafund Kembara has just completed a €750 million first close toward its €1 billion target.

item.title: Google’s subscriptions rise in Q4 as YouTube pulls $60B in yearly revenue
item.description: The company said it now has 325 million paying users across Google One and YouTube Premium, up from 300 million users three months earlier.

item.title: What Is Thread? Matter’s Smart Home Network Protocol, Explained
item.description: Thread is a mesh networking protocol that connects low-power smart home gadgets, and it’s one of Matter’s underlying technologies.

item.title: Sam Altman got exceptionally testy over Claude Super Bowl ads
item.description: He posted a novella-sized rant that devolved into to calling his rival "dishonest" and "authoritarian."

item.title: Brenna Huckaby Starter Pack: Paralympic Winter Games 2026
item.description: How this four-time Paralympic medalist controls her controllables under the spotlight.

item.title: How iPhones Made a Surprising Comeback in China
item.description: Huawei’s and Xiaomi’s flagship devices are packed with impressive features, but Apple is dominating the Chinese smartphone market again—for now.
